br.com.caelum.vraptor.reflection

Class DefaultMethodExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.reflection.DefaultMethodExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodExecutor

    @ApplicationScoped
public class DefaultMethodExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodExecutor
    This class should use method handle to invoke methods.
    Author:
    Alberto Souza
